plot: "Tel Aviv" is an American Jew's worst nightmare: Stranded in the Israeli Desert, Harvey is picked up by a van of Palestinians... Brotherhood, survival and breaking down of prejudice in a ten minute Arabic, Hebrew and English Film.
title: Tel Aviv
